meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Luke McConnell Joe Wolke Faith O'Neal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4450.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Luke McConnell, a student from Carmel, Indiana
Joe Wolke, a vice president of IT communications and information from Northbrook, Illinois
Faith O'Neal, an attorney from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,000)

tr.td: NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS
HOOP-LA
NOBEL PEACE PRIZE WINNERS
GRAMBLING MARCHING BAND
FICTIONAL CHARACTERS
W.W.
